Package mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.basicPitchLcsAligner

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aligner
    Code for aligning a score contained in an Alignment object (and updating the alignment accordingly) with a given sequence of notes.
    Aligner.AlignmentPair
    Represents a pair of alignments.
    Aligner.DouglasPeucker
    Douglas-Peucker algorithm for simplification of linear approximations of a function: remove unnecessary points if the linear interpolation without them deviates from the original function less than a given \epsilon.
    Aligner.DouglasPeucker.Point  
    AlignmentComputation  
    AlignmentComputationWorker
    A usual instance of Thread blocks the GUI.
    BasicPitchLCSAligner
    This is an illustration on how to use AbstractAlignmentComputation.
    ObjectCache
    The ObjectCache class is a Java class that provides an in-memory cache for storing objects.
    Transcriber
    An implementation of the Basic Pitch audio-to-MIDI transcription algorithm that uses model weights exported to ONNX format.
    Transcriber.NoteEvent  
    Transcriber.NoteEventWithTime  
    Transcriber.PairComparator
